ValidationRule.description: Registration Closed cannot be unchecked. User must submit a request to salesforce@erepublic.com to deactivate VR if registration needs to be reopened. This is also currently utilized for DEV QC on system sync overriding this field.
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Registration Closed cannot be unchecked. Submit a request to salesforce@erepublic.com if registration needs to be reopened.
